text: 4. Trump senate trial is constitutional because his misconducts and his speeches were one on one with the people, because he was president at that time . It must be strict and brad in inclusive of all events occurred , what’s said and done by him or as a result of what he said or implied .  There is no trial without evidences and witnesses . There is no “Empty decision” as conviction must be reached with different degrees . If we don’t do so , we will be asking every next president to violate the constitution, abuse the people and office , incite on sedition for his/her personal interest to stay in power instead of accepting the law , and respecting the people’s voice. Plus we will be asking the next president to ask for his impeachment , as it will result in nothing.

3. Again there is no time constraint for indictment impeach or trial of a president, while in office, after leaving office or if his conduct occurred before holding office. The magnitude, influence and weight of the misconduct is what being addressed against him/her , everything else is a “work around” on the fringe. - The United States vs Nixon and the Clinton vs Jones support it , while the Nixon vs Fitzgerald was controversial as it contradicted the USvNixon case.

2. Subpoena the president , or his office documents, is granted by U.S vs Nixon U.S Supreme case which will serve Congress or Judicial branch in executing their job. 

Judicial and congressional hearings, trials and decisions, is supposed to be based on spirit of the constitution to protect its core establishment by the framers . 1. Federal cases are brought in behalf of the people for protecting people’s rights and their interests. 2. No one is above the law . President is in contrast to a King .

The debatable argument that a president is immune from incitement  has no ground as the United States vs Nixon decided other wise , and his lawyers who argued the decision didn’t extend to indictment , but it was a myth and manipulation of wordings , because it’s implied decision . But as of now if serving in office, POTUS is considered immune from criminal incitement ; hence Former POTUS is not immune from any indictment, trials as long as he Is not anymore in office.  In Trump case his impeachment started when he was in office , by him finishing his term because he was voted out , doesn’t mean the case is closed . It means the impeachment hearings need to tried  by Senate . Presidents are the one who sets on official chairs . Their jobs is to serve the country , and not abuse the office or the chair . They are not equal , the president is changeable , but the chair and office are not .
